CmdLine: apt-get update &&     apt-get install -y wget                        software-properties-common &&     add-apt-repository -y ppa:jonathonf/python-3.6 &&     echo "deb [arch=amd64] http://dl.google.com/linux/chrome/deb/ stable main" >> /etc/apt/sources.list &&     wget https://dl.google.com/linux/linux_signing_key.pub &&     apt-key add linux_signing_key.pub &&     apt-get update &&     apt-get install -y curl                        bash                        sudo                        nano                        python3.6                        python3-dev                        python3-cryptography                        python-selenium                        openssh-client                        libmemcached-dev                        libffi-dev                        psutils                        unzip                        automake                        net-tools                        git                        default-jdk                        google-chrome-stable &&     curl https://bootstrap.pypa.io/get-pip.py | python3.6 &&     git config --global user.email "test@test.ing" &&     git config --global user.name "Test User" &&     wget https://chromedriver.storage.googleapis.com/2.32/chromedriver_linux64.zip -O /tmp/chromedriver_linux64.zip &&     unzip /tmp/chromedriver_linux64.zip -d /usr/local/bin &&     rm /tmp/*.zip
Commands.Name: run
